title: Food Menu for Shawnee Correctional Center

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I hope this request finds you in good health.
I request that a copy of the following documents [or documents containing the following information] be provided to me that pertains to Shawnee (parent facility and NRC) Correctional Center:

Past years' master menus (2023 - present) for correctional officers and other prison staff.

Please provide information that's most recent, and if unavailable any older information including year 2023 - present.

Please include information about food distributors and any menu pricing or cost information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. In order to help to determine my status to assess fees, you should know that I am affiliated with a community organization and this request is being made out of concern for public health.

In the event that there are fees, please inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Colin Morrin

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Colin Morrin
